title: Antietam National Battlefield: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Burnside Bridge Closed for Repairs  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Burnside Bridge Closed for Repairs  Starting October 9 the Burnside Bridge will be closed for major repairs to the historic structure. more
